about_the_game:
Four composers in the Digital Future Lab collaborated to produce 14 ghoulishly haunted orchestral and electronic tracks for Ghostlight Manor, arranged here as an album-length soundtrack!

All files included are in .mp3 format.

Track List
  • 1. Welcome to Ghostlight Manor (1:04)
  • 2. Ghost on Hallows Eve (5:39)
  • 3. Requiem for a Scream - The Haunted Meadow (3:27)
  • 4. Requiem for a Scream - Into the Dark (4:55)
  • 5. Requiem for a Scream - Hauntingly Late (3:57)
  • 6. Requiem for a Scream - Lightning and Despair (3:12)
  • 7. Requiem for a Scream - Ghoulish Abode (2:18)
  • 8. Spooky New World (4:00)
  • 9. Ominous Premonition (2:58)
  • 10. Enter the Depths (4:24)
  • 11. Lurking in the Shadows (3:08)
  • 12. Ascending Hope (4:46)
  • 13. Nightfall (4:16)
  • 14. Phantom's End (3:03)
